reviews.name: Daniela F.
reviews.comment: These cookies are pure love in a bite! Soft, flavorful, and baked just right. My kids couldn’t stop eating Mr. Choc. We'll be ordering again for sure!

reviews.name: Lucas M.
reviews.comment: Miss Caramelo was a hit in our office snack time. The caramel center is just perfect. Wish I had ordered more minis!

reviews.name: Sofia G.
reviews.comment: I love supporting family-run businesses and Mr. Cookie never disappoints. Every bite feels like home. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Mateo R.
reviews.comment: Miss Valentine is the best cookie I've ever had! Soft red velvet, creamy filling, and the white chocolate chunks are divine.

reviews.name: Valentina C.
reviews.comment: Great cookies overall! I liked Mr. Crunch a lot, though it was a little too nutty for me. Still worth trying!

reviews.name: Emilia H.
reviews.comment: Just WOW! These cookies taste like they're made with so much love. The packaging was adorable too. Perfect gift!

reviews.name: Marco D.
reviews.comment: Mr. Coconut was good but could’ve used a touch more chocolate. The texture was spot on though. Still enjoyed it.

reviews.name: Ana L.
reviews.comment: The Oreo cookie is addictive! Loved the mix of white and dark chips. It's sweet, crunchy, and chewy all at once.

reviews.name: Isabella S.
reviews.comment: Tried the mini mix and couldn’t pick a favorite. Every cookie was unique and delicious. Perfect for gifting!

reviews.name: Diego A.
reviews.comment: The cookies were yummy and soft, just how I like them. Delivery was a little slow, but the taste made up for it.
